OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD MENTAL HEALTH CITIZENS ADVICE BUREAU LTD

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides a free generalist and specialist confidential advice service for users of mental health services in Sheffield and their carers, friends and relatives. Offers advice in the following areas: benefits, immigration, employment, housing, consumer, tax, debt, child support, relationship breakdown, mental health issues, etc. Home visits. Helps with reviews and represents at tribunals. Advice by email is not provided. Can offer specialist training on mental health issues and advice. Also provides an advocacy service to help people put their views to their mental health providers and provides statutory independent mental health advocacy for people subject to the Mental Health Act. Company limited by guarantee no 4275776. Self or any referral.
